to just tell me

2655.text:
how they did some things so I'm

2659.text:
And I'm talking to the
people from the boss,

2670.text:
I'm just curious from
the people around me,

2674.text:

2690.text:
ASTRO TELLER: I
understand the question.

2691.text:
I believe everyone here
is a moonshot thinker,

2696.text:
I promise you, I would not
be giving this talk this way

2699.text: if I did not believe that.

2700.text:
I believe that
most of us are not

2702.text:
in a context where we can be
as open minded, as honest,

2709.text:
as authentic as we want to be,
as our natural selves would be.

2713.text:
And I think you need to ask your
context for that opportunity.

2718.text:
And if it's really not going
to give it to you, be humble,

2721.text:
And if it doesn't work,
go find a new context.

2724.text:
